fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.utils

Class CompoundMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.utils.TimedEntity
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.utils.CompoundMeasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MeasureI, TimingI, java.io.Serializable

    public class CompoundMeasure
extends TimedEntity
implements MeasureI
    The class CompoundMeasure implements a set of measures made on some phenomena, each having a value and a MeasurementUnit.

    Description

    Glass-box Invariants

     invariant       measures != null && measures.length > 0

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-11-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompoundMeasure

        public CompoundMeasure(java.io.Serializable[] compoundData,
                       MeasurementUnit[] measurementUnits)
        create a composite measure.

        Contract

         pre     compoundData != null
 pre     measurementUnits != null
 pre     Stream.of(measurementUnits).allMatch(u -> u != null)
 pre     compoundData.length == measurementUnits.length
 post    !isScalar()
        Parameters:
        compoundData - array of measurement data.
        measurementUnits - array of the the measurement units used to expressed compositeData.

      • CompoundMeasure

        public CompoundMeasure(MeasureI[] measures)
        create a composite measure from an array of scalar measures.

        Contract

         pre     measures != null
 pre     Stream.of(measures).allMatch(u -> u != null && u.isScalar())
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        measures - array of scalar measures to be put in this composite.

      • CompoundMeasure

        public CompoundMeasure(fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock ac,
                       java.io.Serializable[] compoundData,
                       MeasurementUnit[] measurementUnits)
        create a composite measure from an array of measurement data.

        Contract

         pre     ac != null
 pre     compoundData != null
 pre     measurementUnits != null
 pre     Stream.of(measurementUnits).allMatch(u -> u != null)
 pre     compoundData.length == measurementUnits.length
 post    !isScalar()
        Parameters:
        ac - an accelerated clock giving the time reference.
        compoundData - array of measurement data.
        measurementUnits - array of the the measurement units used to expressed compositeData.

      • CompoundMeasure

        public CompoundMeasure(fr.sorbonne_u.utils.aclocks.AcceleratedClock ac,
                       MeasureI[] measures)
        create a composite measure from an array of scalar measures.

        Contract

         pre     ac != null
 pre     measures != null
 pre     Stream.of(measures).allMatch(u -> u != null && u.isScalar())
 pre     Stream.of(measures).allMatch(u -> u.getTimeReference().equals(ac.getClockURI()))
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        ac - an accelerated clock giving the time reference.
        measures - array of scalar measures to be put in this composite.

      • timeCoherence

        public java.time.Duration timeCoherence()
        Description copied from interface: TimingI
        compute the time coherence among the timings; if only one timing exists, as in scalar measures, the coherence is Duration.ZERO, otherwise it is the largest duration between distinct timings (e.g., for compound measures).

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    return != null
        Specified by:
        timeCoherence in interface TimingI
        Overrides:
        timeCoherence in class TimedEntity
        Returns:
        the time coherence among the timings.
        See Also:
        TimedEntity.timeCoherence()
